addVoice: Add your voice to the conversation by becoming a member!
checkInbox: Check your inbox! If you don't see anything, be sure to check your spam folder.
emailedLink: We'll email you with a link to reset it.
passwordLength: Your password must be 8 characters or longer.
individualDescription: An individual user, which also includes any non-incorporated Massachusetts based organizations
orgDescription: Only available for incorporated Massachusetts Organizations
orgVetting: All Organization types have to go through a request and approval process ran by MAPLE admins. Once your request has been approved you will recieve an email and be granted access into MAPLE
establishedPolicy: We have established this Privacy Policy so you can understand the care with which we intend to treat your personal information.
infoStored: We store your name, email address, state representative, senator, and password.
infoShared: Everything you share with us, other than your email and password, will be available on our website, MAPLE.
noSale: We do not and will not sell any of your personal information.
userUnderstands: You understand that by submitting your testimony to MAPLE you are making it available to MAPLE under an express license that allows reproduction.
newsletterInfo: We may send newsletters via email to MAPLE members. You can unsubscribe from these newsletters at any time by using the 'Unsubscribe' link in the emails themselves. We never share with or sell your email to third party providers.
agreeRequired: In order to continue you must agree to the privacy policy and terms of use
subscribeNewsletter: Click here to subscribe to our newsletter
verifyLinkSent: Please verify your email for your account by clicking the verification link we sent to your email. You will be required to verify your email before submitting testimony.
